segments.text: I can ’ t believe the cost of apartments in New York City .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , you didn ’ t know that apartments here are considered valuable , even if they are small and crowded ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course I had heard about that , but now I know how expensive it is to rent a place here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t mind paying high rent to live in New York .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why ? You pay so much for such a tiny space to live .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , but so what ! I ’ m proud to live in the world ’ s most exciting city . And , the salaries here are the highest in the nation , too .
segments.speaker: S2
